author: _hk786
content:
Any thoughts if there are potential use-cases of Kleros in an OR centered world where economic game-theoretic proofs have to be sent on-chain. The dispute resolution could be decentralized and incentivized by PNK?
I was reading their roadmap and got intrigued as ORs could benefit from it maybe.
